pearls.title: Use leverage to measure your engineering effectiveness
body: Focus on what generates the highest return on investment for your time spent.
pearls.location: Chapter 1 - Focus on high leverage activities

pearls.title: Systematically increase the leverage of your time
body: Find ways to get an activity done more quickly, to increase the impact of an activity, or to shift to activities with higher leverage.
pearls.location: Chapter 1 - Focus on high leverage activities

pearls.title: Focus your effort on leverage points
body: Time is your most limited asset. Identify the habits the produce disproportionately high impact for the time you invest.
pearls.location: Chapter 1 - Focus on high leverage activities
